snippet: Novak Djokovic defeated David Ferrer, 6-2, 6-1, to win the World Tennis Championship exhibition tournament in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.
abstract: Novak Djokovic defeats David Ferrer in World Tennis Championship exhibition tournament in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic defeated David Ferrer, 6-2, 6-1, to win the World Tennis Championship exhibition tournament in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.

headline.seo: Djokovic Defeats Ferrer in Abu Dhabi Exhibition
headline.main: Djokovic Defeats Ferrer in Abu Dhabi Exhibition
